news.title: Shiva Cement posts net loss of Rs 4.44 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: The company's total income stood at Rs 48.98 lakh in Q2 FY22 as against Rs 5.35 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: China's Modern Land defaults on payment, shares drop
news.para: Modern Land (China) Co Ltd said in a filing that it had not repaid principal and interest on its 12.85% senior notes that matured on Monday due to "unexpected liquidity issues".

news.title: Chinese Estates to book $37 million loss from sale of Kaisa bonds
news.para: The Hong Kong-based property developer and investor sold an aggregate amount of $55 million notes issued by Kaisa for $19.32 million including accrued interest on Oct. 22 and 25 over the counter, it said in a filing to the Hong Kong bourse late on Monday.

news.title: Adler Group to sell real estate units for over $1.16 billion
news.para: The transaction follows Adler's sale of residential and commercial property for 1.49 billion euros to rival LEG Immobilien after an activist investor described it as "not investible".

news.title: Chandigarh administrator to introduce land pooling policy for development
news.para: UT adviser Dharam Pal said Bengaluru-based Indian Institute of Human Settlement has been entrusted with the task of formulating a land aggregation and pooling policy.

news.title: Panel report on dangerous buildings in Ulhasnagar soon
news.para: Shinde said that the committee, formed four months ago to look into the technical problems related to the redevelopment of dangerous buildings in Ulhasnagar, is expected to be finalised soon.

news.title: Process to acquire land for metro station begins in Patna
news.para: The acquisition process will be completed by February 2022 to pave way for the construction of ISBT metro station and Patna Metro Rail Depot in Ranipur and Pahadi areas.

news.title: Corporators demand Gunthewari schemes in Pune civic body areas
news.para: Many small property and plot owners will benefit from this scheme; along with existing properties, even those in the recently merged 23 villages should be allowed to be regularised in this scheme, they said.

news.title: Goa government circular soon to issue numbers to illegal houses
news.para: On Monday, Godinho held a meeting with officials of the directorate of panchayats to discuss the procedure to issue house numbers to illegal houses to collect house tax.

news.title: Mahindra Lifespaces posts net profit of Rs 13 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: The company's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 65.70 crore in Q2 FY22, a growth of 75 per cent from Rs 37.42 crore it registered in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Land owners protest Bengaluru development body's demolition drive
news.para: The demolition drive was carried out in the backdrop of the Supreme Court’s December 2020 order that categorically stated that all constructions done in the area after August 3, 2018 are deemed to be illegal.

news.title: Rajasthan CM nod to prepare draft to bring down regularisation rates
news.para: At a review meeting of the state government’s ambitious campaign ‘Shahar-2021’, chief minister Ashok Gehlot on Monday gave nod to provide additional financial relief to small plot owners in urban areas who were willing to procure lease deeds.

news.title: Kansai Nerolac Paints' net profit dips 48% to Rs 87 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: Kansai Nerolac Paints' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,626.12 crore in Q2 FY22, a growth of 17 per cent from Rs 1,388.02 crore registered in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Brookfield, Godrej Fund in race to acquire IL&FS' headquarters in Mumbai
news.para: The asset is being monetised through a price-discovery mechanism and there was no reserve price set for the property spread over 10 floors. However, the IL&FS board had estimated the property might fetch around Rs 1,200 crore.

news.title: RBI's move to allow FPIs in REITs, InvITs' debt to improve liquidity, lower cost
news.para: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman, in the union budget 2019, had allowed FPIs to invest in REITs and InvITs, but the enabling was yet to take place.
